thread.title: Missouri shocks Auburn with a buzzer-beater in the SEC Tournament
thread.title_full: Missouri shocks Auburn with a buzzer-beater in the SEC Tournament

author: Harry Lyles Jr.
title: Missouri shocks Auburn with a buzzer-beater in the SEC Tournament
text:
What a win.
The Missouri Tigers were dead last this season in the SEC at 7-23, but are feeling the magic of the month of March after a buzzer-beating victory over Auburn.
With 2.7 seconds left, the Tigers’ Kevin Puryear caught the ball at the top of the 3-point arc, fired, and knew it was going in as he backpedaled to mid-court for the 86-83 win:
M-I-Z!!!!

Kevin Puryear nails the game-winner to give @MizzouHoops the 86-83 OT win over Auburn. pic.twitter.com/7hsjr1xRR3 
— SEC Network (@SECNetwork) March 9, 2017 Here’s another look from the other end of the floor:
Mizzou wins 86-83 on Kevin Puryear's 3 at the buzzer in OT. Tigers now 18-14 on the season. pic.twitter.com/hrm7QZGqpU 
— Jeff Shearer (@jeff_shearer) March 9, 2017 With the win, Missouri will face Ole Miss in the second round on Thursday, with the winner slated to play Arkansas in the quarterfinals.
You can view the entire SEC Tournament bracket here .
